tuv.seg: Widow's, Widower's or Surviving Civil Partner’s (Non-Contributory) Pension
Pinsean Baintrí, Baintrí Fir nó Páirtnéara Shibhialta Mharthanaigh (Neamh-Ranníocach)

A Widow's, Widower's or Surviving Civil Partner’s (Non-Contributory) Pension is a means-tested payment payable to a widow, widower or surviving civil partner who does not qualify for a contributory widow's, widower's or surviving civil partner’s payment

Is íocaíocht de réir tástála acmhainne í Pinsean Baintrí, Baintrí Fir nó Páirtnéara Shibhialta Mharthanaigh (Neamh-Ranníocach) iníoctha le baintreach, le baintreach fir nó le páirtnéir sibhialta marthanach nach bhfuil incháilithe d’Íochaíocht Bhaintrí, Baintrí Fir nó Páirtnéara Shibhialta Mharthanaigh (Rannaíoch)
(This payment was formerly called the Widow's/Widower's (Non-Contributory) Pension)
Tugadh an Pinsean Baintrí/Baintrí Fir (Neamh-Ranníocach) ar an íocaíocht seo roimhe seo
It is is a payment for widows, widowers or surviving civil partners who do not have dependent children
Is é pinsean do bhaintreacha, do bhaintreacha fir nó do pháirtnéirí sibhialta marthanacha nach bhfuil leanaí cleithiúnacha acu
People with dependent children should apply for the One-Parent Family Payment or Jobseeker's Transitional payment
Ba cheart do dhaoine a bhfuil páistí cleithiúnacha acu cur isteach ar an Íocaíocht Teaghlaigh Aontuismitheora
You transfer to State Pension (Non-Contributory) when you reach 66 years of age
Nuair beidh tú 66 bliana d'aois aistrífear é go Pinsean Stáit (Neamh-Rannaíocach)
This pension is taxable but you are unlikely to pay tax if it is your only income
Tá an pinsean seo inchánach ach má tá tú gan aon ioncam eile, ní miste cáin a ghearradh air
Tto qualify you must, of course, be a widow, widower or surviving civil partner and you must not be cohabiting with another person
Chun cáiliú ní mór duit a bheith i do bhaintreach, do bhaintreach fir nó do pháirtnéir sibhialta a mhaireann, agus ní féidir leat a bheith in aontíos le duine eile

You can keep your entitlement to this pension if you are divorced or your civil partnership has been dissolved, and you would have been entitled to this pension had you remained married or in the civil partnership

Coinníonn tú do theidlíocht an pinsean seo a fháil má tá tú colscartha nó má tá do pháirtíocht sibhialta tar éis díscaoileadh, agus dá mbeadh tú i dteideal an phinsean a fháil dá bhfanfá pósta nó sa pháirtíocht shibhialta
• Pass a means test and
• Má éiríonn leat sa scrúdú maoine agus
• Be habitually resident in the State
• Má sásaíonn tú na coinníollacha a bhaineann le gnáthchónaí
Your means are any income you have or property (except your own home) or an asset that could bring in money or provide you with an income
Is ionann do chuid acmhainní agus ioncam nó réadmhaoin ar bith atá agat (seachas do theach féin) nó sócmhainn ar bith a d'fhéadfadh airgead a thabhairt isteach nó ioncam a sholáthar duit
Your means are assessed using specific rules under the following headings:
Meastar acmhainní de réir rialacha sonracha faoi na cinnteidil a leanas:
• Cash income (including, income from work)
• Ioncam airgead tirim agus ioncam ó fhostaíocht
• Value of capital (for example, savings, investments, cash on hand and property but not your own home)
• Luach caipitil agus maoine nach bhfuil úsáid phearsanta á baint as
• Income from property personally used
• Luach maoine a bhfuil úsáid phearsanta á baint as (m.sh., ,coigiltis, infheistiochtai airgead tiruin seachas, do theach cónaithe)
Cash income and income from work
Ioncam airgead tirim agus ioncan ó fhostaíocht
Any cash income you have is assessed in the means test
Déantar measúnú sa scrúdú maoine ar gach ioncam i bhfoirm airgid atá agat
This includes income from a social security pension from another country
I measc na míreanna d’ioncam airgid a dhéantar a mheasúnú tá aon ioncam ó phinsean slándála sóisialaí ó thír eile
However, certain items of cash income are not taken into account in the means test
Tá míreanna áirithe den ioncam airgid nach gcuirtear san áireamh, áfach
For example, earnings of up to €100 per week from employment (but not self-employment) are not taken into account
Ní chuirtear san áireamh, mar shampla, airgead suas go €100 in aghaidh na seachtaine a thuilltear de thoradh fostaíochta (ach ní de thoradh féinfhostaíochta)
Any income from work above €100 is assessed as means
Is mar mhaoin a áirítear gach ioncaim os a chionn sin
More information is available in our document about cash income not taken into account in the means test
Ní chuirtear íocaíochtaí a fhaightear faoin Scéim Scoir Feirmeoireachta san áireamh
Since January 2012, any income you get from working as a home help for the HSE is taken into account in the means test
Ioncam Cúntóra Bhaile: Ó Eanáir 2012 cuirtear aon ioncam a fhaigheann tú ó obair mar chúntóir baile le FSS san áireamh don tástáil acmhainne
Capital and property not personally used
Caipiteal agus maoin nach bhfuil úsáidte go pearsanta
Savings, investments, cash on hand and any property you own (but not your own home) is assessed as capital
Déantar measúnacht ar choigilteas, infheistíochtaí, airgead ar láimh agus réadmhaoin ar bith ar leat í (ach nach é do bhaile féin é) mar chaipiteal
All your capital from different sources is added together and a special formula is then used to find your weekly means from capital
Cuirtear do chuid caipitil ar fad ó fhoinsí éagsúla le cheile agus baintear úsáid as foirmle speisialta ansin le do chuid acmhainní seachtainiúla ó chaipiteal a aimsiú
The property and investments that may be assessed under this heading include savings in a bank account (or anywhere else), a house that you have let and stocks and shares

Áirítear leis an réadmhaoin agus na hinfheistíochtaí a bhféadfaí a mheas faoi réir na ceannscríbhinne seo coigilteas i gcuntas bainc (nó áit ar bith eile), teach atá ligthe amach ar cíos agat agus scaireanna
You may or may not be getting an income from the property or investment
Is féidir go mbeidh tú ag fáil ioncaim ón réadmhaoin nó ón infheistíocht nó nach mbeidh
Income from property already assessed on its capital value is not assessed in the means test - see 'Cash income' above
Ní dhéantar measúnacht ar ioncam ó réadmhaoin atá measúnaithe cheana féin ar a luach caipitil sa tástáil mhaoine - féach ioncam airgid thuas
More information is available in our document on how capital and property is assessed as means
Tá tuilleadh eolais ar fáil inár ndoiciméad maidir leis an dóigh a ndéantar réadmhaoin a mheas mar acmhainn
Income from property personally used (your home)
Maoin a mbaintear úsáid phearsanta as
The value of the house you live in is not taken into account in the means test
Ní mheastar do theach cónaithe mura bhfuil ioncam á thuilleamh agat as
For example, if you rented a room in your house, that income is assessed
Mar shampla, tá seomra tí ligthe ar cíos agat, measfar an t-ioncam as sin
There is an exception to this, if not renting the room means that you would be living alone then your income from rent is not taken into account
Ach, más i d'aonar a bheifeá ag cónaí murach an seomra sin a bheith ligthe, ní mheasfar an t-ioncam ar chor ar bith
Your means under the various headings are added together to see what level of pension, if any, you can get
Suimítear d'acmhainní faoi na cinnteidil éagsúla chun méid aon phinsin ar féidir leat a fháil a mheas
The first €7.60 per week of means as assessed by the Department of Social Protection does not affect the rate of pension
Ní bhíonn aon tionchar ar ráta an phinsin ag an gcéad €7.60 de mhaoin in aghaidh na seachtaine faoi mar a dhéanann an Roinn Coimirce Sóisialaí measúnú uirthi
After that, the pension is reduced by €2.50 each week for every €2.50 of means
Ina dhiaidh sin déantar laghdú €2.50 in aghaidh na seachtaine ar an bpinsean in aghaidh gach €2.50 maoine

Download and complete Form WP1 here (pdf)
Íoslódail agus comhlánaigh foirm iarratais WP1 (pdf)
You can also get application forms from post offices
Tá foirmeacha iarratais ar fáil ag oifig an phoist
If you are unhappy with a decision made on your claim you can appeal against it
Cá háit a ndéanfaidh mé iarratas
Department of Social Protection
Department of Social Protection
You can email the Widow's, Widower's or Surviving Civil Partner’s (Non-Contributory) Pension section using the secure enquiry form
Is féidir leat ríomhphost don Rannóg Phinsean Baintrí, Baintrí Fir nó Páirtnéara Shibhialta Mharthanaigh (Neamh-Ranníocach) a sheoladh tríd an fhoirm fhiosraithe a úsáid
If you wish to talk to someone face-to-face about your pension entitlements, you can visit your local Citizens Information Centre, Intreo Centre or Social Welfare Branch Office
Más mian leat labhairt duine-le-duine faoi do theidlíochtaí, is féidir leat cuairt a thabhairt ar d'Ionad Faisnéise do Shaoránaigh áitiúil, Ionad Intreo nó d'Oifig Bhrainse Leasa Shóisialaigh
